attributes.additional_details:
Planet Earth has lost 50% of its wildlife in the last 40 years due to unsustainable human consumption and destruction of habitat. If half the animals died in London zoo next week it would be front page news.

It's time for Government and the International Community to put a real, robust plan of action forward and set the trend for change.

Planet Earth is not for Human Consumption. All creatures were created equal. It's time to stop shirking, brushing under the carpet and ignoring the intense strain we put on this planet and it's inhabitants.

Sign now for change.
